<#00cd00>You have 10 items in the <#cdcd00>Various Tools<white> category.

<#00cd00>Fangs of corrosion, a Celestine darkbow of the Hunt, a pair of whirring diffusal goggles of whitesight, a pair of red lace panties, a sprawling venantium cuff, a wyrmskin pack, a hood, a buckler, a black leather weaponbelt of the wolf of cloaking, a sleek, black quiver, an onyx and garnet ring, 2 polished rings set with a dark Umbrael, a black arm sheath of many daggers, a suit of leather armour, snow wight boots, a ylem-binding gauntlet of the Parxian Order, a pitch black shirt with obsidian buttons, a practical pair of black pants.
